example: Newborn babies have instinctual reflexes, like sucking and grasping.

Many animals perform mating rituals to attract a partner during the breeding season.

Avoiding predators is a challenging part of survival for many small animals.
Temperature is an important environmental factor affecting animal behavior.

Practice and experience help animals develop ability to solve problems.
Animals may stop trying to access a food source if it's too difficult to reach.
Don't give up on understanding animal behavior—it's full of fascinating insights.
Conservationists take measures to protect animals from harmful environmental factors.
